nodes.text: A Dynamic hammer was a type of vibrotool that was developed for the Grand Army of the Republic during the Clone Wars. Using a vibration system to move the head of the hammer, as it struck an object, it caused an almost explosive impact.
During an argument, Sander Delvardus was said to have struck his mistress, Seledra-Zin, with one. The resultant blow rendered her comatose.
